long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟Introduction🌟
Managing your Facebook™ friends can be time-consuming and tedious, but with AutoFriends, it becomes effortless. AutoFriends is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify your Facebook™ experience by automating friend management tasks. Whether you want to add new friends, confirm friend requests, delete unwanted connections, cancel sent requests, or unfriend people, AutoFriends handles it all with just a few clicks.

🌟How It Works🌟
⏩Install AutoFriends: Add the AutoFriends extension to your Chrome browser.
⏩Log In to Facebook™: Log in to your Facebook™ account.
Choose Your Actions: 
      1.First you need to go to the page according to the task. (for 
       example: if you expect add friend in suggestion section, you 
       should go to the suggestion friend page)
       2.Select the desired Task (Add, Confirm, Delete, Cancel, 
       Unfriend) from the AutoFriends interface.
       3.Enter the number of friends you want to process
       4.Set the interval time (in seconds)
       5.If you need set more time interval, you can enable toggle 
       button. it’s working between requests (It is not mandatory to 
       prepare it) (optional)
       6.Now click “Start” button
       7.You can see it automasion. enjoy!
       8.if you click the “Stop task” button, stopped currently running 
       task.
⏩Automate the Process: Sit back and let AutoFriends handle the rest. It will automatically execute your chosen action, saving you time and effort.

🌟Important Notes🌟
This extension was previously called "Friends Add & Confirm". Now it is called AutoFriends.

This extension works only with English language in Facebook™. (make sure change language to english in Facebook™).

Facebook™ is a trademark of Facebook™ Inc. This  extension, namely “AutoFriends" has no connection to Facebook™ inc.

Use this extension at your own risk and carefully. The developer is not responsible for any restrictions on your Facebook™ account by using this extension. Using "AutoFriends" Chrome Extension means that you agree to these terms.
